thread.title: IAFC appoints financiers for Saudia's 50-aircraft order
thread.title_full: IAFC appoints financiers for Saudia's 50-aircraft order

author: flightglobal.com
title: IAFC appoints financiers for Saudia's 50-aircraft order
text:
Middle Eastern lessor International Airfinance has appointed parties to arrange debt and equity financing for Saudia's 50-aircraft Airbus order.
Quantum Investment Bank and Palma Capital will source financing for the Saudi Arabian flag carrier's 30 A320-200s and 20 A330-300s.
Saudia has agreed to acquire and lease the units.
